name: Good luck seducing an Ace witch [REBUILD]
name_original: Good luck seducing an Ace witch [REBUILD]
description:
Jo Arcour after finishing work gets kidnapped by a witch in order to be chopped up in the potion as the main ingredient. And depending on your choice he might die or find a new friend.

♣The Novel is (almost) fully voiced!

♠Time: 60 min

♥Endings: 6

♦Languages: English, Korean (Lunapeusa), Russian

Shout out to VA team LD who helped with a rebuild and made RUS dub for our shoer Ace novel!

Do you want to support the project? Or maybe see more of game's sequel Ace witch?  ♠♦ If you want to support the project or see more of game sequel "Ace witch" progress, you can Follow my boosty for 3$ And you will see other games I'm working on (●ˇ∀ˇ●)
